A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Meh. Some good moments but many corny ones. The plot was a mess and it could stand to lose at least an hour of filler. Yes the special effects were great but so what at this point. Still better than episodes 1-3\, but worse than all 3 originals and Rogue One. I’m confused that it got so many good reviews. It felt more like a Fast and Furious movie than Star Wars. True that Star Wars movies have big shoes to fill\, but the series feels lost. The First Order is no Empire\, and the Resistance is no Rebel Alliance. It just feels like a dumb blockbuster—not Star Wars.
